fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Croatia.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Croatia's Mateo Kovacic breaks free at Arena de Sao Paulo . But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Croatia needs to be cautious. Brazil have an attacking throw-in.
Croatia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Brazil.
Brazil's David Luiz goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Croatia surge into the attack at Arena de Sao Paulo but Ivica Olic’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Brazil.
Important block from the Croatia defence as Paulinho fires in a strike for Brazil.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Ball safe as Croatia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcelo has the misfortune to make it 0-1 through an own goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Brazil throw-in in Croatia's half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Croatia a goal kick.
Brazil push forward at Arena de Sao Paulo and Neymar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Croatia defence.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?
Throw-in Brazil.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Brazil have a dangerous throw-in.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Brazil throw-in in Croatia's half.
Brazil drive forward and Paulinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hulk (Brazil) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Croatia have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Croatia at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Goal kick for Croatia at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Can Croatia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Croatia to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Neymar is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Croatia close to the penalty box.
Goal! Neymar equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Croatia in the half of Brazil.
Throw-in for Brazil at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Croatia have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Croatia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Croatia throw-in in Brazil's half.
Can Brazil capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Croatia's half?
Throw-in for Croatia at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Croatia to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Throw-in for Croatia in the half of Brazil.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Brazil capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Brazil's Dani Alves gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Croatia defender.
In Sao Paulo, Neymar of Brazil is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Croatia in their own half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brazil drive forward but Oscar is judged offside.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Croatia territory.
Brazil are pushing forward but Hulk's finish is wide of the goal.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Croatia a goal kick.
Throw-in Brazil.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Croatia.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
The first-half has ended.
Throw-in for Croatia at Arena de Sao Paulo .
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Croatia.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?
Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Brazil, close to Croatia's area.
Free kick in a good position for Brazil!
Free kick for Croatia in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Croatia throw-in in Brazil's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Croatia.
Ivan Perisic for Croatia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Croatia.
Throw-in for Croatia in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Croatia in the half of Brazil.
Throw-in high up the field for Croatia in Sao Paulo.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Croatia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Niko Kovac (Croatia) is making a first substitution, with Marcelo Brozovic replacing Mateo Kovacic.
Throw-in Brazil.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Croatia.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Hernanes is replacing Paulinho for the home team.
Croatia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Free kick Brazil.
Vedran Corluka (Croatia) gets a yellow card.
Brazil are coming forward and Dani Alves gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Croatia a goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Brazil throw-in in Croatia's half.
Croatia needs to be cautious. Brazil have an attacking throw-in.
Brazil make their second substitution with Bernard replacing Hulk.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Brazil throw-in in Croatia's half.
Free kick Brazil.
At Arena de Sao Paulo , Dejan Lovren has been yellow-carded for the away team.
An attacking Brazil player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
It's advantage Brazil in Sao Paulo as Neymar scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
Corner awarded to Croatia.
In Sao Paulo, Dejan Lovren (Croatia) misses the target with a header.
Brazil have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Free kick for Croatia in their own half.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Brazil attack but David Luiz's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Croatia at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Niko Kovac is making the team's second substitution at Arena de Sao Paulo with Ante Rebic replacing Nikica Jelavic.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Throw-in for Croatia at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Fred (Brazil) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball safe as Croatia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Croatia have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Croatia have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Croatia in the half of Brazil.
Luka Modric gets his shot on target but fails to score for Croatia.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Brazil's Luiz Gustavo has been booked in Sao Paulo.
The home team replace Neymar with Ramires.
The second half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In Sao Paulo, Vedran Corluka (Croatia) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Throw-in for Croatia close to the penalty box.
Goal! Brazil extend their lead to 3-1 through Oscar.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Brazil, close to Croatia's area.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Croatia's Marcelo Brozovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brazil have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Arena de Sao Paulo . The final score is 3-1.
